title: Protect
description: Rose was satisfied with her life as a magical librarian. Who needs friends and romance when you can have unlimited access to one of the largest magical libraries in existence? But when a mysterious research request comes in, she is forced out of her comfort zone and out of the TOMBS.  He's a Guardian, assigned to protect those who would be a catalyst for change. So far, nothing has ever distracted him from an assignment. Thatâ€™s until he meets Rose. With the help of his friend Gris, he will protect her, even die for her, should it come to that.  But are they ready for Rose to come into their life?  As this series continues it will become part of the Reverse Harem genre.Librarian's note: See alternate cover edition of ASIN B079XP8PWK here.
author: K.B. Wheelock
